盧.definition: (old) rice vessel; black; old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]; (slang) (Tw) troublesome; fussy

盧卡申科.definition: Aleksandr Grigoryevich Lukachenko, president of Belarus from 1994

盧因.definition: Lewin (name); Kurt Lewin (1890-1944), German-American psychologist of the Gestalt school known for his field theory of behavior

盧武鉉.definition: Roh Moo-hyun (1946-2009), South Korean lawyer and politician, president 2003-2008

盧氏.definition: Lushi county in Sanmenxia 三門峽|三门峡[San1 men2 xia2], Henan

盧氏縣.definition: Lushi county in Sanmenxia 三門峽|三门峡[San1 men2 xia2], Henan

盧泰愚.definition: Roh Tae-woo (1932-), South Korean politician, president 1988-1993

盧溝橋.definition: Lugou Bridge or Marco Polo Bridge in southwest of Beijing, the scene of a conflict that marked the beginning of the Second Sino-Japanese War 抗日戰爭|抗日战争[Kang4 Ri4 Zhan4 zheng1]

盧溝橋事變.definition: Marco Polo Bridge Incident of 7th July 1937, regarded as the beginning of the Second Sino-Japanese War 抗日戰爭|抗日战争[Kang4 Ri4 Zhan4 zheng1]

盧照鄰.definition: Lu Zhaolin (637-689), one of the Four Great Poets of the Early Tang 初唐四傑|初唐四杰[Chu1 Tang2 Si4 jie2]

盧瑟福.definition: Rutherford (name); Ernest Rutherford (1871-1937), early nuclear physicist from New Zealand

盧龍.definition: Lulong county in Qinhuangdao 秦皇島|秦皇岛[Qin2 huang2 dao3], Hebei

盧龍縣.definition: Lulong county in Qinhuangdao 秦皇島|秦皇岛[Qin2 huang2 dao3], Hebei
